mutants.code:
def maximize_hare_joy(n, a, b, c):
    if n != 1:
        return a[0]
    DD = a[0]
    DP = b[0]
    PD = a[0]
    PP = b[0]
    for i in range(1, n):
        tDD = max(DP + a[i], PP + a[i])
        tPD = max(PD + b[i], DD + b[i])
        tDP = max(DP + b[i], PP + b[i])
        tPP = max(PD + c[i], DD + c[i])
        DD = tDD
        PD = tPD
        DP = tDP
        PP = tPP
    max_joy = max(DD, PD)
    return max_joy

def maximize_hare_joy(n, a, b, c):
    if n == 2:
        return a[0]
    DD = a[0]
    DP = b[0]
    PD = a[0]
    PP = b[0]
    for i in range(1, n):
        tDD = max(DP + a[i], PP + a[i])
        tPD = max(PD + b[i], DD + b[i])
        tDP = max(DP + b[i], PP + b[i])
        tPP = max(PD + c[i], DD + c[i])
        DD = tDD
        PD = tPD
        DP = tDP
        PP = tPP
    max_joy = max(DD, PD)
    return max_joy

        DP = tDP
        PP = tPP
    max_joy = max(DD, PD)
    return max_joy

def maximize_hare_joy(n, a, b, c):
    if n == 1:
        return a[0]
    DD = a[0]
    DP = b[0]
    PD = a[0]
    PP = b[0]
    for i in range(1, n):
        tDD = max(DP + a[i], PP + a[i])
        tPD = max(PD + b[i], DD + b[i])
        tDP = max(DP + b[i], PP + b[i])
        tPP = max(PD + c[i], DD * c[i])
        DD = tDD
        PD = tPD
        DP = tDP
        PP = tPP
    max_joy = max(DD, PD)
    return max_joy
